Unjuk Rasa, Massa Protes Proyek Podomoro di Bojongsoang
05 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Handri Handriansyah
SOREANG, (PR).- Ratusan massa memprotes pekerjaan proyek perumahan Podomoro Land di Jln. Raya Bojongsoang, Kabupaten Bandung, Selasa 5 November 2019. Kelompok yang mengatasnamakan organisasi masyarakat Manggala Garuda Putih Kabupaten Bandung itu, memprotes proyek karena dinilai banyak menimbulkan dampak negatif bagi warga sekitar dan pengguna jalan.
Mereka juga menuntut pengembang untuk menunjukan izin proyek yang diduga tidak sesuai ketentuan.Juru bicara dari Biro Hukum Mangga Garuda Putih Kabupaten Bandung, Ijudin Rahmat mengatakan, dampak lingkungan dari aktivitas proyek Podomoro Land sudah sempat menimbulkan korban jiwa beberapa waktu lalu.
"Kejadiannya adalah truk pengangkut material proyek membawa tanah basah ke jalan warga, sehingga jalan menjadi licin dan terjadi kecelakaan," ujarnya tanpa menjelaskan kapan dan siapa korban dalam kejadian tersebut.Menurut Ijudin, pihaknya sempat mempertanyakan tanggung jawab pihak Podomoro terkait kejadian tersebut. Namun Podomoro menyatakan bahwa mereka sudah memberi kompensasi kepada ahli waris korban."Masalahnya bukan kompensasi, tetapi bagaimana supaya tidak ada lagi korban. Sekalipun memiliki izin, seharusnya pelaksanaan pekerjaan tidak ceroboh sehingga ada tanah yang jatuh, jalan licin dan terjadi kecelakaan," tutur Ijudin.Kata Ijudin, ada beberapa hal yang ganjil dalam perizinan proyek Podomoro Land Bojongsoang. "Selain ada lahan besar milik PT KA, wilayah ini merupakan lahan hijau basah yang seharusnya digunakan untuk pertanian sesuai Peraturan Daerah Kabupaten Bandung Nomor 27 Tahun 2016 tentang Tata Ruang Kabupaten Bandung 2016-2026," ujarnya.Ia mengatakan, aksi akan dilanjutkan dengan mengerahkan massa lebih besar sampai proyek ditutup. "Kami juga akan mempertanyakan perizinan Podomoro ke instansi terkait di Pemkab Bandung. kami juga akan minta klarifikasi ke PT KA kenapa mereka memberi izin kepada podomoro, sedangkan warga yang tinggal di bantaran rel justru digusur," kata Ijudin.
Tanggapan Podomoro Land
Mengomentari aksi tersebut, Staf Bagian Umum Podomoro Land Suhardi mengaku bersyukur aksi tersebut berlangsung dengan damai dan tertib. Ia pun mengaku menyerahkan sepenuhnya pengamanan aksi kepada pihak yang berwajib.Terkait masalah perizinan yang dipertanyakan massa, Suhardi menegaskan bahwa pihaknya sudah mengantongi berkas perizinan lengkap. "Kalau tidak ada izin lengkap, kami tidak bisa jalan, pasti akan ditertibkan oleh instansi pemerintah," ucapnya.Begitu juga terkait amdal, ia menyebut proyeknya sudah memperhitungkan saluran-saluran air masyarakat yang ada selama ini. Hal itu pun dipastikan dari hasil pemeriksaan Dinas Lingkungan Hidup Kabupaten Bandung yang secara rutin datang mengecek."Kami bekerja selalu diperiksa oleh instansi terkait. Bahkan terkadang dari lingkungan hidup datang tiba-tiba untuk inspeksi mendadak untuk memastikan apakah pekerjaan kami sesuai dengan kajian dan aturan atau tidak. Kami juga harus melakukan pelaporan rutin setahun dua kali," tuturnya.
Sementara terkait lahan PT KA, Suhardi menegaskan bahwa pihaknya memang sudah menjalin kerjasama dengan BUMN tersebut. Ia menilai bahwa tidak ada aturan yang melarang swasta bekerjasama dengan BUMN selama itu saling menguntungkan.Menurut Suhardi, kerjasama dengan PT KA tidak lepas dari sejumlah wilayah di lokasi Proyek Podomoro Land memang ke depannya akan terlewati proyek jalur LRT. "Sebagai pendukung, kami akan membangun taman untuk jalur LRT tersebut," ucapnya.***

Rallies, Mass Protests Podomoro Project in Bojongsoang
05 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Handri Handriansyah
SOREANG, (PR) .- Hundreds of masses protested against the work of the Podomoro Land housing project on Jln. Raya Bojongsoang, Bandung Regency, Tuesday 5 November 2019. The group on behalf of the Bandung White Manggala Garuda organization protested the project because it was considered to have a lot of negative impacts on local residents and road users.
They also demanded developers to show project permits that were allegedly not in accordance with regulations. A spokesman from the Garuda White Mango Legal Bureau in Bandung Regency, Ijudin Rahmat said, the environmental impact of Podomoro Land project activities had caused casualties some time ago.
"The incident was that the truck carrying material for the project brought wet soil to the residents' roads, so the road became slippery and there was an accident," he said without explaining when and who the victims were in the incident. However Podomoro stated that they had given compensation to the heirs of the victims. "The problem is not compensation, but how to prevent more victims. Even though they have permission, the implementation of the work should not be careless so that there is land falling, slippery roads and accidents," said Ijudin Ijudin said, there were a number of odd things in the licensing of the Podomoro Land Bojongsoang project. "In addition to the large land owned by PT KA, this region is a wet green land that should be used for agriculture in accordance with Bandung Regency Regulation No. 27 of 2016 concerning the Bandung Regency Spatial Plan 2016-2026," he said. He said, the action would be continued by mobilizing the masses. bigger until the project is closed. "We will also question the licensing of Podomoro to the relevant agencies in Bandung Regency Government. We will also ask clarification from PT KA why they gave permission to Podomoro, while residents who live on the banks of the railroad were actually evicted," said Ijudin.
Podomoro Land's response
Commenting on the action, Podomoro General Section Staff Land Suhardi said he was grateful that the action took place in peace and order. He also admitted that he had fully surrendered the security of the action to the authorities. Regarding licensing issues that were questioned by the masses, Suhardi stressed that his party had already pocketed the complete permit documents. "If there is no complete permit, we cannot run, it will definitely be controlled by government agencies," he said. Likewise related to Amdal, he said the project had taken into account the existing community water channels. That was also ensured from the results of the Bandung Regency Environmental Service examination which routinely came to check. "We work always inspected by the relevant agencies. Even sometimes from the environment comes suddenly for a sudden inspection to ascertain whether our work is in accordance with studies and regulations or No. We also have to do routine reporting twice a year, "he said.
While related to PT KA's land, Suhardi stressed that his party had indeed established cooperation with the BUMN. He considered that there was no regulation prohibiting the private sector from cooperating with SOEs as long as it was mutually beneficial. According to Suhardi, the cooperation with PT KA could not be separated from a number of areas in the Podomoro Land Project location, in the future the LRT path project would be passed. "As supporters, we will build a park for the LRT pathway," he said. ***
